output_list.criticism: The transfer function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's balance to a very large number, potentially leading to a loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's balance to a very large number, potentially leading to a loss of funds.
The approve function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's allowance to a very large number, potentially leading to a loss of funds.
The increaseApproval function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's allowance to a very large number, potentially leading to a loss of funds.
The decreaseApproval function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set any user's allowance to a very large number, potentially leading to a loss of funds.
